Posts.EditableText: the compass buttons dont interfere with the command system. What i mean by this, is that when say, an NPC asks you something, and the next thing you type goes into the string variable #wotever#, the buttons cant be pressed, except, the up and down buttons. if you press these, down/up is entered into the string variable. i know you could say, "well dont press them", but still, they should act the same way as the other navigation buttons do
